data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Barbara Robinson | January 11, 2023 | Baird Funeral Home
data.text:
Barbara Evelyn Robinson, age 79, of Troy, OH passed away on January 11, 2023 at Hospice of Miami County. She was born on February 21, 1943 in Piqua, OH to the late James Howard and Frances Ethel (Clark) Gustin.

She is survived by her son: Mark A. Robinson of Lake City, FL; daughter: Laura E. Bigelow of Lake City, FL; grandchildren: Ashley, Megan, Courtney and Kristine and great grandchildren: Isabella, Evelyn and Korbin.

In addition to her parents, Barbara was preceded in death by her husband of 57 years of marriage: Richard A. Robinson and siblings: James and Ben Gustin, Juanita Astorino and Patricia Coleman.

She was a 1961 graduate of Miami East High School. She was formerly employed by IBM Key Punch and Sherwood Bowling Lanes and represented Fashion Two-Twenty.

She was a 4-H advisor with Staunton Busy Bodies for over 20 years. She loved the sun and working in her garden and yard.

Services will be held at 10:00AM on Tuesday, January 17, 2023 at the Baird Funeral Home, Troy with interment to follow at Casstown Cemetery. The family will receive friends from 4:00-7:00PM on Monday, January 16, 2023 at the funeral home.

Memorial contributions may be made to Bethel United Methodist Church, 2505 East Loy Road, Piqua, OH 45356 or Hospice of Miami County, 3230 North County Road 25A, Troy, OH 45373. Condolences may be expressed to the family through www.bairdfuneralhome.com.
